Token.Abstract: The TICDSOperationDelegate protocol defines the methods implemented by delegates of any generic TICDSOperation. In the TICoreDataSync framework, these delegate methods are implemented by the application and document sync managers.
Informs the delegate that the operation has completely and successfully finished its tasks.

Parameter.Name: anOperation
Parameter.Abstract: The operation object that sent the message.

Token.Abstract: Informs the delegate that the operation was cancelled before it could finish its tasks.

Parameter.Name: anOperation
Parameter.Abstract: The operation object that sent the message.

Token.Abstract: Informs the delegate that the operation failed to complete before it could finish its tasks.

Parameter.Name: anOperation
Parameter.Abstract: The operation object that sent the message.
